title: News Crystal: Mindblowing simulation shows how ‘dominant’ the United States air force actually is

content.title: Mindblowing simulation shows how ‘dominant’ the United States air force actually is
content.description: The United States air force is so large that its closest rivals are other branches of the US military, and a simulations shows just how much more they have.
content.author: Joe Harker
